statements: DELETE FROM customer_surveys WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND satisfaction_score < 3;
DELETE FROM customer_surveys WHERE survey_id IN (SELECT survey_id FROM customer_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score = 1);
DELETE FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201
DELETE FROM customers WHERE loyalty_level > 3 AND total_purchases < 100
DELETE FROM Survey WHERE survey_rating > 5 AND survey_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Response WHERE response_text LIKE '%not satisfied%';
